interpretation: The Green Square represents growth and prosperity. It symbolizes the renewal of nature and the freshness of new beginnings. This card is a reminder to take a step back and appreciate the beauty of the world around you. Take a deep breath and let the fresh air fill your lungs. Focus on the growth and potential in your life, and allow yourself to embrace the natural changes that occur. This card also signifies a need for balance and harmony, encouraging you to find stability in your life. Stay grounded and connected to the earth, and you will find success and prosperity in your endeavors. The Green Square is a powerful reminder that all things in life are constantly changing, and it is up to us to adapt and grow with them. Trust in the process of life, and you will find yourself flourishing in ways you never thought possible.
